events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect item.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. who will be handling the refund process for the customer.
Hello! I am sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I am here to help get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund efficiently.
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 123456789 and I have attached pictures of the item I received instead of what I ordered.
We have reviewed your photos and confirmed the mistake. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for processing the refund so quickly. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund request has been resolved and the refund has been processed successfully. Please allow a few days for the payment to appear in your account.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard any further concerns from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting customer support.
